title: Hour 2 - Sam Mellinger (05-29-20)
itunes:title: Hour 2 - Sam Mellinger (05-29-20)
description:
Sam Mellinger tells Dan that the Kansas City Chiefs number one goal is to sign Patrick Mahomes to a long term contract. Sam says he is confident that the Chiefs will make Patrick Mahomes the highest paid QB in the league.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
